definition: orchid/fragrant thoroughwort/(botany) Eupatorium fortunei/Herba Eupatorii (used in Chinese medicine)
to respect/to wear (belt etc)
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu

sentences.english: I make some sachets of fragrant orchids and give them to my friends every Dragon Boat Festival.
sentences.chinese: 每年的端午節，我都會用佩蘭做些香袋送給朋友。

sentences.english: The wood wears an orchid anxious way.

definition: to wash off dust

to awaken from a dream
Yushu Tibetan autonomous prefecture (Tibetan: yus hru'u bod rigs rang skyong khul) in Qinghai
character (of a person, verse, object etc)/style
cicada slough/fig. to free oneself/to extricate oneself from

to wash silk
root of Chinese pulsatilla/Chinese bulbul

scarlet kafir lily/Clivia miniata (botany)
